name: Flags Matching Game Free
description:
The ultimate flags memory matching game has come!
200+ flags from all over the world!
Train your memory and your knowledge!
Tap to flip world globes, find those with the same flag to make them disappear.
When showing the flag, the name of the country will appear.
How long will it take you to make them all disappear??
3 Levels:
- Easy: find matching pairs in a 4x4 board
- Medium: find matching pairs in a 6x5 board
- Hard: find matching pairs in a 6x6 board

** CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS IN GAME CENTER **

Have fun!!
